subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
Sports Medicine
Luxury Goods
lead_paragraph: Trading away stars, or even productive veterans, for prospects with no guarantees, could cause a destructive chain of events affecting a wide swath of income streams for the Mets.
snippet: Trading away stars, or even productive veterans, for prospects with no guarantees, could cause a destructive chain of events affecting a wide swath of income streams for the Mets.
